dict.string: MAMP is a free, local server environment that can be installed with just a few clicks.
MAMP communicates with this server to access its documentation.
If you deny this connection, you may not be able to access the in-app documentation in full or view the introductory tour.
MAMP communicates with hosts on this domain to validate ssl certificates.
If you deny this connection, you may not be able to establish a secured connection to our servers.
MAMP communicates with this server to help us improving your user experience and to offer a comfortable way to upload crash reports.
If you deny this connection, we won't be notified automatically about potential issues or crashes of MAMP, and thus won't be able to fix them asap.
